org.drip.analytics.definition

Class CurveSpanConstructionInput

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.analytics.definition.CurveSpanConstructionInput
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CurveConstructionInputSet
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ShapePreservingCCIS

    public abstract class CurveSpanConstructionInput
extends java.lang.Object
implements CurveConstructionInputSet
    CurveSpanConstructionInput contains the Parameters needed for the Curve Calibration/Estimation. It contains the following: - Calibration Valuation Parameters - Calibration Quoting Parameters - Calibration Market Parameters - Calibration Pricing Parameters - Array of Calibration Stretch Representation - Map of Calibration Quotes - Map of Calibration Measures - Double Map of the Date/Index Fixings Additional functions provide for retrieval of the above and specific instrument quotes. Derived Classes implement Targeted Curve Calibrators.
